title: 77/3/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 December 1976 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 December 1976 on the adjustment of the boundaries of less-favoured areas within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (France) (Only the French text is authentic) (77/3/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas in France contained in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended as shown in the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1976.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1.  (2) OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 33.  (3) OJ No L 108, 26.4.1976, p. 22.
ANNEX Supplement to Directives 75/271/EEC and 76/401/EEC in accordance with Article 2 (3) of Directive 75/268/EEC of 28 April 1975
